entry.tran: (巨大、复杂、极端得)令人难以想象的
entry.def: If you say that something is mind-boggling, you mean that it is so large, complicated, or extreme that it is very hard to imagine.

example.ex: The amount of paperwork involved is mind-boggling.
example.tran: 相关的书面工作量大得令人难以想象。

auth_sentence.content: It really is mind-boggling when you think of it.
auth_sentence.res_content: It really is mind-boggling when you think of it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It really is mind-boggling when you think of it.

auth_sentence.content: The complexity of the body it controls is mind-boggling!

auth_sentence.content: Its mind boggling that some people actually believe that.
